headline: VC Investor | I enjoy helping start-ups and Founders Grow | Author of "Meaningful Entrepreneurship"
about:
As a Managing Partner at Grow Venture Partners, I invest in early-stage deep tech and tech transfer companies that have a strong technology and IP, but more importantly, that have founders who are passionate, resilient, and driven by a sense of meaning and purpose. I have over 20 years of experience in managing, advising, and investing in start-ups, mainly in the fields of internet, deep tech, and tech transfer.

I enjoy coaching and mentoring founders, helping them shape their strategy, vision, and values, and supporting them throughout their growth journey. That is why I wrote Meaningful Entrepreneurship, a book that challenges entrepreneurs to find their own answers and to align their personal and professional goals. I also share my knowledge and insights as a board member of several deep tech start-ups, a mentor and investor of others, and a coordinator, mentor, and lecturer of a deep tech pre-acceleration program at Barcelona Activa. I believe that by fostering meaningful entrepreneurship, we can create happier entrepreneurs, better and more successful companies, and a better world.
razonamiento: El t√≠tulo de 'Managing Partner' indica un rol de liderazgo alto. Su descripci√≥n destaca la inversi√≥n en startups en etapa temprana y su inter√©s en ayudar a los fundadores, lo que sugiere que revisa pitch decks. Aunque est√° ocupado, su pasi√≥n por el emprendimiento y su rol como mentor sugieren una probabilidad razonable de respuesta.

headline: Managing Partner at 4Founders Capital
about:
We are actively investingüí∞! Initial tickets from ‚Ç¨200k up to ‚Ç¨2M in Spanish startups or with a Spanish link (Spaniards across the globe, commercially launching in Spain or tech hub/subsidiary based here). Reach out if you want to explore a collaboration! üöÄ

A bit about myself: 
Born in Venezuela, raised in Spain. Studied Business Administration in Boston, at Northeastern University (Summa Cum Laude).

 +12 years of experience in Venture Capital, having worked for funds based out of Silicon Valley (HTGC), Spain and UK. I launched and managed the CVC arm of Bank Sabadell in Spain for +7 years. Have been shortlisted as European Femtech leader for 4 consecutive years by Innovate Finance. I co-founded and managed a micro Fintech investment vehicle, Vulcan Partners, making Seed investments across Fintechs in Europe (+25 investments, over 9 countries). I also tried the entrepreneurial side confounding a credit lending startup, but unfortunately we didn‚Äôt make it (painful but real lessons learned) 

I am now Managing Partner at 4Founders Capital, leading Seed VC fund with HQ in Spain.

headline: Founder & CEO at Decelera | Pioneering the World‚Äôs First Startup Decelerator | Championing Sustainable Entrepreneurship
about:
Marcos is a dad of 3, passionate about life, nature, and human relations. 

He is also a founder, board member, investor, and advisor with the mission of helping early-stage and purpose-driven entrepreneurs. His extensive career spans over 20 years in technology and energy.

As the Founder of Decelera, Marcos pioneered the Startup Decelerator Methodology, a founder-centric approach, helping entrepreneurs step back from their daily grind to focus on sustainable growth. He also co-founded Sancus Capital, Torret Road, Menorca Millennials, BIO-E-Resources, AWoods, the European Pellets Council, and the ENPlus Certification system, contributing significantly to the energy and startup sectors.

In 2023 he raised a 40M round for Decelera Ventures I and now is expanding the business to Mexico, having a track-record of +30 invested startups.

headline: Founder and Managing Partner at Samaipata | Early stage VC
about:
As a founder turned venture capital investor, I have a distinctive perspective on building and scaling businesses. With over a decade of experience founding companies and working with some of Europe‚Äôs most ambitious entrepreneurs, I have gained valuable insights into the challenges and opportunities that arise at different stages of the startup journey.

My entrepreneurial journey began with the founding of La Nevera Roja, a food delivery startup that quickly became the largest player in the Spanish market. As the founder and CEO, I was responsible for driving the company's growth, from raising ‚Ç¨10m in capital to building a high-performing team, culminating in its acquisition by a listed German company for c.100m in less than 40 months after launch.

Building on the success of La Nevera Roja, I co-founded Samaipata, a venture capital firm that focuses on investing in early-stage digital businesses with network effects. As the founder and managing partner of Samaipata (‚Ç¨150m AUM), I have the privilege of working with a stellar team distributed across Europe in our offices in London, Paris, and Madrid. I am passionate about working with ambitious entrepreneurs who dare to be bold, think differently and better the world. At Samaipata, we help them bring their vision to life and provide the support and resources they need to succeed through our founder success platform, "The Hive."

My focus now is on investing in extremely sticky, highly scalable, and defensible products (mostly B2B) with network effects. If you are a founder in the early stages and resonate with this focus, I would be delighted to connect and explore how we can work together to achieve your goals. Get in touch!
razonamiento: El perfil indica que es Founder y Managing Partner, lo que sugiere un rol de liderazgo muy alto dentro del fondo (9). Dada su posici√≥n y enfoque en invertir en early-stage, es muy probable que revise pitch decks (9). El texto invita a los fundadores a contactarlo, lo que sugiere una buena probabilidad de respuesta, aunque dado su rol senior, podr√≠a estar muy ocupado (7).

headline: Investing and partnering with #Deeptech visionary founders to invent a better future
about:
With over >15  years of experience in engineering, technology and business management, I am a passionate and experienced leader in the field of Deep Tech. As a Partner at Big Sur Ventures, I invest in startups that are addressing global challenges in Energy transition, Decarbonisation, Mobility, Industry 5.0 and Population.

Before joining Big Sur Ventures, I was the CEO and managing partner of FYLA, a Deep Tech company transformed from a spin-off with few IP assets into a market leader with reference clients in key enabling industries. At FYLA, I led the strategic vision, business development, and external relations, while building a world-class team of talented and inspired people. Some of my achievements include  expanding the global presence and partnerships, and increasing the revenue and profitability. I leveraged my skills in new business development, C-level management, and industrial engineering to create value for FYLA and its stakeholders.

headline: Partner @Antai Ventures - Investing in the best founders and supporting them along their journey from 0 to 1
about:
At Antai Ventures, we invest in top founders turning good ideas into great companies.

Antai Ventures is a Barcelona-based venture studio, that co-founds and funds category-defining companies. We invest in the best founders and support them on their journey to achieve product-market-fit and make their vision reality. Since 2012, we have co-founded +30 companies, including Glovo, Wallapop, Nemuru, PlatanoMelon, Vitaance, Piper, Balance among others.

Before that, I graduated with a Dual Degree in Business Administration and Supply Chain Management at North Carolina State University (USA) and Universit√° Cattolica del Sacro Cuore (Italy). After realizing I would rather not spend my career figuring out how to move something from point A to point B in the most efficient way, I decided to follow my entrepreneurial interests. I took a MSc in Innovation and Entrepreneurship at ESADE Business School where I fell in love with this world.

My passion for finding ways to get together the best version of ourselves and leverage technology to solve the problems we most care about, is the red line that connects all of this.
razonamiento: El t√≠tulo de Partner indica un rol de liderazgo muy senior dentro del fondo. Su descripci√≥n en LinkedIn enfatiza la inversi√≥n en fundadores, sugiriendo que revisa pitches. Dado su rol, es probable que responda, aunque su tiempo estar√° limitado.
